ai-mil7.2.8:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when there was a grandfather you say ‘sticy’, what was the only one of us?”
ai-mil7.2.8:1.2_0: “Just as, great king, Susumedhā, just as long as the root of a tree is not held back eventually.
ai-mil7.2.8:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices like a teacher; one who is like the senior monk who roams and transferred to another shouldn’t take it up.
ai-mil7.2.8:1.4_0: This is the one-eyed transfer to the other.
ai-mil7.2.8:1.5_0: The Buddha has spoken it to you, sir,
ai-mil7.2.8:2.4_0: you’ll live together with the king.’”
ai-mil7.2.8:3.1_0: The eighth enquiry is the eighth (perception).
